activities: Xylem Inc. will use and otherwise process EU Personal Information in the United States for various purposes, including:  Workflow management, such as assigning, managing and administering projects;  Compensation, including stock plan administration, compensation analysis and other company recognition programs;  Job grading activities;  Performance management;  Organizational development and succession planning;  Benefits and personnel administration including bonuses;  Helpdesk and IT support services;  Litigation evaluation, prosecution and defense;  Compliance investigations; Diversity and Inclusion initiatives;  Shareholder management;  Restructuring;  Emergency contacts and services, Business Travel and Communications activities and related expense processing.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Water Resources Eqpt & Services - (WRE)Pumps Valves & Compressors - (PVC)
personaldata: Manually processed data.  On and off line data to include HR Data
recoursemech: Xylem Inc. commits to cooperate with the data protection authorities located in the European Union and Switzerland or their authorized representatives. In addition, Xylem Inc. Corporation's compliance group provide each employee with a means of seeking recourse elsewhere in the company for unresolved complaints at different levels within the company.
